mGroundMesh.description: The static mesh we want for representing the decoration when placed on ground.

mGroundMeshScale.description: Scale that can be used for the ground mesh

mMesh1p.description: The static mesh we want for representing the decoration when equipped in 1p.

mMesh3p.description: The static mesh we want for representing the decoration when equipped in 3p.

mDecorationActorClass.description: The actor to spawn on primary fire press if we want one, can be null

mEquipmentClass.description: The equipment that is linked to this descriptor.

mStackSize.description: How many of this item can be in the same slot in an inventory

mCanBeDiscarded.description: Indicates if this item can be thrown in the trash or not

mRememberPickUp.description: Do we want to know if this item ever has been picked up

mEnergyValue.description: Energy value for this resource if used as fuel. In megawatt seconds (MWs), a.k.a. mega joule (MJ)

mForm.description: The state of this resource (cannot change during it's lifetime).

mInventoryIcon.description: Old brush used for UI, can't be DEPRECATED_ as it won't work in shipping builds during conversion then

mSmallIcon.description: Small icon of the item, always in memory

mPersistentBigIcon.description: Big icon of the item, SHOULD only be loaded by demand, but right now persistent in memory

mConveyorMesh.description: The static mesh we want for representing the resource when they are in the production line.

mPreviewView.description: The view in the build menu for this item

mIconYaw.description: The jaw of the object when rendering the icon

mIconView.description: The distance to the object when rendering the icon
